TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit MemberInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider, class System.Runtime.InteropServices._MemberInfo
Public MustInherit Class MemberInfo Implements _MemberInfo, ICustomAttributeProvider
type MemberInfo = class interface ICustomAttributeProvider interface _MemberInfo

summary.span: 获取有关成员属性的信息并提供对成员元数据的访问权限。

span.span: Obtains information about the attributes of a member and provides access to member metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于获取有关类（构造函数、事件、字段、方法和属性）的所有成员的信息的类的抽象基类。The class is the abstract base class for classes used to obtain information about all members of a class (constructors, events, fields, methods, and properties). 此类引入所有成员提供的基本功能。This class introduces the basic functionality that all members provide. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析包含在程序集中的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
This type is thread safe.

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写以下成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有派生类才能创建此 `MemberInfo` 类。Only a derived class can create this `MemberInfo` class.

.property instance class System.Type DeclaringType
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DeclaringType As Type

summary.span: 获取声明该成员的类。

span.span: Gets the class that declares this member.

value.span: 声明该成员的类的 对象。

span.span: The object for the class that declares this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索对声明此成员的类型的 对象的引用。The property retrieves a reference to the object for the type that declares this member. 类型的成员既可以由类型声明，也可以从基类型继承，因此 属性返回的 `Type` 对象可能与用于获取当前 对象的 `Type` 对象不同。A member of a type is either declared by the type or inherited from a base type, so the `Type` object returned by the property might not be the same as the `Type` object used to obtain the current object. - 如果从中获取此 `MemberInfo` 对象的 `Type` 对象未声明此成员，则 属性将表示其一个基类型。If the `Type` object from which this `MemberInfo` object was obtained did not declare this member, the property will represent one of its base types. - 如果 `MemberInfo` 对象是全局成员（即，如果它是从返回模块上的全局方法的 方法获取的，则将 `null`返回的 。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个具有单个成员 `GetValue``IValue`的接口。The following example defines an interface, `IValue`, with a single member, `GetValue`. 它还定义了四个类： `A`，这是实现 `IValue` 接口的基类;`B`，它从 `A` 继承，并从基类实现中隐藏其 `GetValue` 实现;`C`，它只继承自 `A`;和 `D`，它们继承自 `A` 并重写其 `GetValue` 方法。It also defines four classes: `A`, a base class that implements the `IValue` interface; `B`, which inherits from `A` and hides its implementation of `GetValue` from the base class implementation; `C`, which simply inherits from `A`; and `D`, which inherits from `A` and overrides its `GetValue` method. 然后，该示例检索该类型的每个成员（包括从 继承的成员）的 对象，并显示其 属性的值。The example then retrieves a object for each member of the type (including members inherited from ) and displays the value of its property. [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/CS/Example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.DeclaringType Example/VB/Example2.vb#2)] 请注意，`A.GetValue` 的声明类型 `A`，则 `B` 包括两个 `GetValue` 方法，其中一个是由 `A` 声明，另一个由 `B`声明，`D.GetValue` 的声明类型 `D`。Note that the declaring type of `A.GetValue` is `A`, that `B` includes two `GetValue` methods, one declared by `A` and one by `B`, and that the declaring type of `D.GetValue` is `D`. > [!NOTE] > `DeclaringType` 仅返回成员名称和其声明类型的名称。`DeclaringType` returns only the member names and the names of their declaring types. 若要返回成员名称及其原型，请调用 `MemberInfo.ToString`。To return the member names with their prototypes, call `MemberInfo.ToString`.

abstract member GetCustomAttributes : bool -> obj[]

param.span: 会忽略属性和事件的此参数。

span.span: This parameter is ignored for properties and events.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，返回应用于此成员的所有自定义属性的数组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of all custom attributes applied to this member.

returns.span: 一个包含应用于此成员的所有自定义特性的数组；如果未定义任何特性，则为一个具有零元素的数组。

span.span: An array that contains all the custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略属性和事件的 `inherit` 参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要在继承链中搜索属性和事件的属性，请使用 方法的适当重载。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，如果方法、构造函数和类型的安全属性以新的元数据格式存储，则此方法将返回这些属性。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if they are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 使用早期版本的 .NET Framework 编译的动态程序集和程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个自定义属性，并将该属性与 `MyClass.MyMethod`相关联，并在运行时检索该属性，并显示结果。The following example defines a custom attribute and associates the attribute with `MyClass.MyMethod`, retrieves the attribute at run time, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttributes1/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattributes1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 此成员属于加载到仅反射的上下文的类型。

span.span: See [How to: Load Assemblies into the Reflection-Only Context](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-load-assemblies-into-the-reflection-only-context.md).

exception.span: 无法加载自定义属性类型。

span.span: A custom attribute type could not be loaded.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an array of custom attributes applied to this member and identified by .

returns.span: 应用于此成员的自定义属性的数组，如果未应用可分配给 的属性，则为含零元素的数组。

span.span: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero elements if no attributes assignable to have been applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略属性和事件的 `inherit` 参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要在继承链中搜索属性和事件的属性，请使用 方法的适当重载。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，如果属性以新的元数据格式存储，则此方法返回方法、构造函数和类型的安全属性。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns security attributes on methods, constructors, and types if the attributes are stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 使用早期版本的 .NET Framework 编译的动态程序集和程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个名为 `BaseClass` 的类，该类具有两个非继承成员：一个名为 `total` 的线程静态字段和一个名为 `MethodA`的不符合 CLS 的方法。The following example defines a class named `BaseClass` that has two non-inherited members: a thread static field named `total` and a non-CLS-compliant method named `MethodA`. 名为 `DerivedClass` 的类继承自 `BaseClass` 并重写其 `MethodA` 方法。A class named `DerivedClass` inherits from `BaseClass` and overrides its `MethodA` method. 请注意，不会将任何属性应用于 `DerivedClass`的成员。Note that no attributes are applied to the members of `DerivedClass`. 该示例将循环访问 `DerivedClass` 的成员，以确定 或 特性是否应用于它们。The example iterates the members of `DerivedClass` to determine whether the or attribute as been applied to them. 由于 `inherit` `true`，因此该方法会搜索指定属性的 `DerivedClass` 继承层次结构。Because `inherit` is `true`, the method searches the inheritance hierarchy of `DerivedClass` for the specified attribute. 如示例的输出所示，`total` 字段通过 特性进行修饰，`MethodA` 方法用 特性修饰。As the output from the example shows, the `total` field is decorated with the attribute, and the `MethodA` method is decorated with the attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/cs/GetCustomAttributes1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes/vb/GetCustomAttributes1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回 对象列表，这些对象表示已应用到目标成员的特性相关数据。

span.span: Returns a list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

returns.span: 对象的泛型列表，表示有关已应用于目标成员的特性的数据。

span.span: A generic list of objects representing data about the attributes that have been applied to the target member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义属性本身是在加载到仅反射上下文中的代码中定义的，则使用此方法在仅反射上下文中检查代码的自定义属性。Use this method to examine the custom attributes of code in the reflection-only context, in cases where the custom attributes themselves are defined in code that is loaded into the reflection-only context. 在这种情况下，不能使用诸如 和 这样的方法，因为它们会创建特性的实例。Methods like and cannot be used in such cases, because they create instances of the attributes. 仅反射上下文中的代码无法执行。Code in the reflection-only context cannot be executed. 有关详细信息和示例代码，请参阅 类。For more information and for example code, see the class. 此方法获取类型、嵌套类型和类型成员的自定义特性数据，因为 类和表示类型成员的 命名空间中的类均派生自 。This method gets custom attribute data for types, nested types, and type members, because the class and the classes in the namespace that represent type members all derive from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会忽略属性和事件的 `inherit` 参数。This method ignores the `inherit` parameter for properties and events. 若要在继承链中搜索属性和事件的属性，请使用 方法的适当重载。To search the inheritance chain for attributes on properties and events, use the appropriate overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中，如果类型、方法或构造函数具有以新的元数据格式存储的安全属性，则此方法返回 `true`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method returns `true` if a type, method, or constructor has security attributes stored in the new metadata format. 使用版本2.0 编译的程序集使用此格式。Assemblies compiled with version 2.0 use this format. 使用早期版本的 .NET Framework 编译的动态程序集和程序集使用旧的 XML 格式。Dynamic assemblies and assemblies compiled with earlier versions of the .NET Framework use the old XML format. 请参阅[发出声明性安全特性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5)。See [Emitting Declarative Security Attributes](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9eeddee8-ca89-4440-b84b-fd613f590cd5). ## Examples 下面的示例确定指定的特性是否应用于指定的成员。The following example determines whether the specified attribute is applied to the specified member. [!code-cpp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CPP/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/CS/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemberInfo_GetCustomAttribute_IsDefined/VB/memberinfo_getcustomattribute_isdefined.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Reflection.MemberTypes MemberType { get; }

Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MemberType As MemberTypes
public: abstract property System::Reflection::MemberTypes MemberType { System::Reflection::MemberTypes get(); };
member this.MemberType : System.Reflection.MemberTypes

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取 值，该值指示成员类型 - 方法、构造函数、事件等。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating the type of the member - method, constructor, event, and so on.

value.span: 指示成员类型的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the type of member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在派生类中被重写，重写将返回相应的成员类型。This property is overridden in derived classes, and the override returns the appropriate member type. 因此，在检查一组 对象（例如， 返回的数组）时， 属性可用于确定任何给定成员的成员类型。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property can be used to determine the member type of any given member. 若要获取 `MemberType` 属性，请获取类 。To get the `MemberType` property, get the class . 从 `Type`获取 的数组。From the `Type`, get the array. 从 `MethodInfo` 数组中获取 `MemberTypes`。From the `MethodInfo` array, get the `MemberTypes`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定类的成员名称和类型。The following example displays the member name and type of a specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值标识元数据元素。

span.span: Gets a value that identifies a metadata element.

value.span: 结合 ，该值能够唯一标识元数据元素。

span.span: A value which, in combination with , uniquely identifies a metadata element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性获取的令牌可传递给非托管反射 API。The tokens obtained using this property can be passed to the unmanaged reflection API. 有关详细信息，请参阅[非托管反射 API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8)。For more information, please see [Unmanaged Reflection API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c5bb9de-0cf6-438d-ba47-134e6c775fb8). > [!NOTE] > 使用非托管反射 API 需要熟悉公共语言基础结构（CLI）文档，尤其是 "第二部分：元数据定义和语义" 和 "第三部分： CIL 指令集"。Using the unmanaged reflection API requires familiarity with the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 当前 表示数组方法（如 ），针对元素类型是尚未完成的动态类型的数组类型。

span.span: The current represents an array method, such as , on an array type whose element type is a dynamic type that has not been completed.

exception.span: 若要在这种情况下获取元数据标记，将 对象传递给 方法；或使用 方法直接获取标记，而不是首先使用 方法获取 。

span.span: To get a metadata token in this case, pass the object to the method; or use the method to get the token directly, instead of using the method to get a first.

summary.span: 获取一个模块，在该模块中已经定义一个类型，该类型用于声明由当前 表示的成员。

span.span: Gets the module in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

value.span: ，在其中已经定义一个类型，该类型用于声明由当前 表示的成员。

span.span: The in which the type that declares the member represented by the current is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了方便。This property is provided as a convenience. 它等效于使用 属性获取在其中声明该方法的类型，然后调用生成的 对象的 属性。It is equivalent to using the property to get the type in which the method is declared, and then calling the property of the resulting object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例声明了继承 和重写 的类。The following code example declares a class that inherits and overrides . 该示例获取类的 `ToString` 方法和继承的 方法的 对象，并显示声明这两种方法的模块的名称。The example obtains objects for the class's `ToString` method and for the inherited method, and displays the names of the modules in which the two methods are declared. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.MemberInfo.Module/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This method is not implemented.

summary.span: 获取当前成员的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current member.
A containing the name of this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅返回成员的简单名称，而不是完全限定名称。Only the simple name of the member is returned, not the fully qualified name. 若要获取 属性，请获取类 。To get the property, get the class . 从 `Type`获取 的数组。From the `Type`, get the array. 从数组的 `MemberInfo` 元素获取 `Name` 属性。From a `MemberInfo` element of the array, obtain the `Name` property. ## Examples 此示例列出指定类的每个成员的 `Name` 和 `DeclaringType` 属性。This example lists the `Name` and `DeclaringType` property of each member of the specified class. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.Name Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于获取 的此实例的类对象。

span.span: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of .

value.span: 对象，通过它获取了此 对象。

span.span: The object through which this object was obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectedType` 属性检索用于获取 `MemberInfo`的此实例的 对象。The `ReflectedType` property retrieves the object that was used to obtain this instance of `MemberInfo`. 如果此 对象表示继承自基类的成员，则这可能与 属性的值不同。This may differ from the value of the property if this object represents a member that is inherited from a base class. 如果 `MemberInfo` 对象是全局成员（即，如果它是从返回模块上的全局方法的 方法获取的，则将 `null`返回的 。If the `MemberInfo` object is a global member (that is, if it was obtained from the method, which returns global methods on a module), the returned will be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从类型 获取的 以及从 类自身（继承 但不重写 ）中查看成员 时更改 。The following code example shows how the changes when the member is viewed from a obtained from type and from a obtained from the class itself, which inherits but does not override . [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.ReflectedType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
